definition: texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up

sentences.english: Psychopathological classifications, which emphasize the mother-child relationships, are essential reference marks.
sentences.chinese: 心理病理學分類，着重於母子關係是必要的參考標準。

sentences.english: Courses include molecular biology, pathobiology, viral pathogenesis, and related topics.
sentences.chinese: 分子生物，病理學，病毒發病機理和相關主題。

sentences.english: If CD31 stains vessels, that is what we expected. We need a pathologist with pediatric pathology background to explain this case.
sentences.chinese: 我們需要有兒科病理知識的病理學者來解釋這個病例。

sentences.english: And this was an alternative model, to the conventional ways model of pathologies.
sentences.chinese: 這是病理學常規模型的，替代模型。
病理學診斷副神經節瘤。

sentences.english: The ultrastructure of arcuate nucleus had obvious pathologic changes.
sentences.chinese: 弓狀核超微結構出現明顯病理學改變。

sentences.english: Sharkey teaches in multiple courses in clinical pathology and small animal internal medicine.
sentences.chinese: 莎基博士主要教授臨牀病理學和小動物內科相關課程。

sentences.english: The tumors and spleens were examined for pathologic change.
sentences.chinese: 並對瘤組織及脾組織進行病理學檢查。

sentences.english: Histopathological examinations was performed using hematoxylin and eosin stain.
sentences.chinese: 組織病理學檢查是用蘇木質伊紅染色。

sentences.english: Histolopathological examination revealed an intramedullary ependymoma.
sentences.chinese: 組織病理學檢查顯示爲髓內室管膜瘤。

sentences.english: The authors observed the morphologie changes of reparative tissue after filtering procedure in rabbit.
sentences.chinese: 本文觀察了兔眼濾過手術癒合過程的組織病理學變化。

sentences.english: Xu Shuyuan, Professor, Supervisor of master's students. Specializes in gynecological tumors and leucoma, and engaged in clinicopathologic and immunopathologic studies.
sentences.chinese: 主攻婦科腫瘤和淋巴瘤的臨牀病理和免疫病理學研究。

sentences.english: This is the website for Department of Pathology , The University of Edinburgh.
sentences.chinese: 這是愛丁堡大學病理學系的網站。

sentences.english: Plant pathology (phytopathology) is dedicated to fighting plant diseases of all kinds.
sentences.chinese: 農作物病理學旨在對抗各種作物疾病。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the clinical and neuropathologic characteristics of tumor-like demyelination diseases.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討腫瘤樣脫髓鞘病臨牀和病理學特點。

sentences.english: Histopathologically the tumor is composed of stromal cells and abundant capillaries.
sentences.chinese: 病理學檢查可見基質細胞和豐富的毛細血管。

definition: loss (of sth through natural disaster, theft etc) (law)

(neologism c. 2013) organized disruption of healthcare facilities or verbal and physical abuse of medical staff, by an aggrieved patient or proxies such as family members or hired thugs, typically aimed at obtaining compensation

pinyin: A1 er3 ci2 hai3 mo4 bing4

definition: abbr. of 資訊工程|资讯工程[zi1 xun4 gong1 cheng2]
each sticks to his own version (idiom); a dialogue of the deaf
